ai-atk-abh03a60:1_0: It’s impossible for them to teach the Dhamma that is skillful and sublime, because of the cause, thus it is a reason for the sake of this Dhamma.
ai-atk-abh03a60:1_1: Herein, just as, when a man has conversed the cause of wholesomeness and profitable states, then having converted all the other words by converse with all conditions, it is profitable and causally converse with all the names of the skillful, doing it by investigating thus:
ai-atk-abh03a60:1_2: having concluded the cause, those who do not let the wholesome together with their for the sake of a skillful,
ai-atk-abh03a60:1_3: from that pleasure and pain because of this the (risking): “Amongst feelings associated with twenty-two parts, for the sake of pleasure and pain, and for the sake of three kinds, and for the sake of function, and twenty-nine kinds of feeling.”
ai-atk-abh03a60:2_0: After conquering thus: “Bindusāra with the cause of young men, having given to that same, as hand of the embarks of all the earth,, embarks of each other with their own hands, and feet, he who resplendently,
ai-atk-abh03a60:2_1: wouldn’t eventually posts it away when he’s plunged into it,
ai-atk-abh03a60:2_2: After having taken two or three courses and twenty-two marks, he placed them in twenty-two parts of the day.
ai-atk-abh03a60:2_3: And the construction here should be understood as mentioned in the same way.
